translated: It is established in the sutras such as the Perfection of Wisdom, because it is applied to the seven aspects of greatness.

original: de'i phyir ches khyad par du 'phags pa rdo rje'i theg pa theg pa chen po ni skye ba 'dir sangs rgyas la sogs pa rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir de'i yon tan dam par gyur pa stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir ches khyad par du 'phags pa rdo rje'i theg pa theg pa chen po ni skye ba 'dir sangs rgyas la sogs pa rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir de'i yon tan dam par gyur pa stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Therefore, the Vajra Vehicle, which is far superior, is the Great Vehicle, because it establishes the state of Buddhahood and so forth in this very life. Its qualities are the highest, such as the powers and the fearlessnesses.

original: de rnams kyi tshogs ni rgyas pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi tshogs ni rgyas pa ste /
translated: Their collection is vast.

original: de rnams yon tan dam par gyur pas so //
analyzed: de rnams yon tan dam par gyur pas so //
translated: Because they are the highest qualities.

original: dus gsum ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar ro //
analyzed: dus gsum ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar ro //
translated: The three times are the past, the future, and the present.

original: dam tshig gsum zhes bya ba ni sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rang bzhin thams cad do //
analyzed: dam tshig gsum zhes bya ba ni sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rang bzhin thams cad do //
translated: The three pledges are the nature of the body, speech, and mind of all the Tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
translated: All the Tathagatas are Vairocana and so forth.

original: bstod pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: bstod pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How do they praise?

original: rnam par rtog pa med pa'i rnam par grol bas gzugs brnyan la sogs pa'i rig pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstod do //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa'i rnam par grol bas gzugs brnyan la sogs pa'i rig pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstod do //
translated: By the knowledge of the reflection, etc., which is the liberation free from conceptualization, all the Tathagatas praise.

original: gang gi phyir brtan pa dang / g-yo ba la sogs pa ma lus pa la stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis khyab cing brtan pa dang / g-yo ba la sogs pa des khyab pas khams gsum rnam par rig pa tsam ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir brtan pa dang / g-yo ba la sogs pa ma lus pa la stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis khyab cing brtan pa dang / g-yo ba la sogs pa des khyab pas khams gsum rnam par rig pa tsam ste /
translated: Because all that is stable and moving, etc. is pervaded by the nature of emptiness, and because that which is stable and moving, etc. is pervaded by it, the three realms are mere consciousness.

original: de'i phyir sdom pa la sogs pa rnams la lha'i rnal 'byor du gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir sdom pa la sogs pa rnams la lha'i rnal 'byor du gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, the yoga of the deity is taught in the pledges, etc.

original: bcom ldan @492b 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan @492b 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gal te ci'i slad du de'i rang bzhin thams cad de'i rnam pas 'jig rten pas de rtogs par mi 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: gal te ci'i slad du de'i rang bzhin thams cad de'i rnam pas 'jig rten pas de rtogs par mi 'gyur ba lags /
translated: if that is the nature of all, why do worldly people not understand it?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said:

original: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
translated: “Because” is the reason.

original: thams cad bdag nyid ces bya ba ni thams cad kyi dngos pos so //
analyzed: thams cad bdag nyid ces bya ba ni thams cad kyi dngos pos so //
translated: “Of all” means of all things.

original: bdag nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni rang gi'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni rang gi'o //
translated: “Of itself” means of its own nature.

original: rnam shes phung por zhes bya ba ni gang zhig rnam par shes pa'i lus la'o //
analyzed: rnam shes phung por zhes bya ba ni gang zhig rnam par shes pa'i lus la'o //
translated: “In the aggregate of consciousness” means in the body of consciousness.

original: gnas pa ni rang rig pa'i sems kyi ngo bo ste /
analyzed: gnas pa ni rang rig pa'i sems kyi ngo bo ste /
translated: “Abides” means the nature of the mind that is self-aware.🔽“Therefore” means because of that.

original: de'i phyir rmongs pa ni gti mug go /
analyzed: de'i phyir rmongs pa ni gti mug go /
translated: “The ignorant” means the deluded.

original: skyes bu tha ma ni rigs pa can la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: skyes bu tha ma ni rigs pa can la sogs pa'o //
translated: “The inferior person” means the Naiyāyika and so on.

original: rtogs mi nus zhes bya ba ni rmongs pa dang bcas pas mi shes so //
analyzed: rtogs mi nus zhes bya ba ni rmongs pa dang bcas pas mi shes so //
translated: “Cannot understand” means they do not know because of their delusion.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The Lord said:

original: gal te de mi 'tshal na ji ltar de rnams kyi de kho na 'tshal ba lags //
analyzed: gal te de mi 'tshal na ji ltar de rnams kyi de kho na 'tshal ba lags //
translated: “If they do not know that, how do they know reality?”

original: bka' stsal pa /🔽sems dang sems byung sems tshul bdag /
analyzed: bka' stsal pa / sems dang sems byung sems tshul bdag /
translated: He said:🔽“The mind, mental factors, and the nature of the mind,

original: ces bya ba ni sems can gyi sems kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni sems can gyi sems kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: “The nature of the mind of sentient beings.

original: sems zhes bya ba ni thams cad du dngos po'i rang bzhin dge ba'i phung po la sogs pa rig par byed pa'i bdag nyid can gyi 'tsho ba'o //
analyzed: sems zhes bya ba ni thams cad du dngos po'i rang bzhin dge ba'i phung po la sogs pa rig par byed pa'i bdag nyid can gyi 'tsho ba'o //
translated: The so-called “mind” is the life force that is the nature of all things, the self that is the agent of the aggregates of virtue and so on.

original: ye shes kyi bdag nyid ces bya ba ni thams cad du 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: ye shes kyi bdag nyid ces bya ba ni thams cad du 'gro ba ste /
translated: The so-called “nature of wisdom” is the all-pervading.🔽In this regard, the nature of wisdom of Viṣṇu is the person. The so-called “nature of the object of knowledge” is the self, the offspring of the powerful one, the experiencer, the agent, the meaning of the abode, the nature of its own entity,🔽and the nature of the agent.🔽The proponents of Īśvara say that Īśvara is the agent of all phenomena.”🔽The so-called “nature of the object of knowledge” is the self, the offspring of the powerful one, the experiencer, the agent, the meaning of the abode, the nature of its own entity,

original: de la khyab 'jug gi ye shes kyi bdag nyid skyes bu'o; ;shes bya'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ba ni shed bu dang / shed las skyes pa dang / tshor ba po dang / byed pa po dang / gnas kyi don dang / rang gi ngo bo can dang /
analyzed: de la khyab 'jug gi ye shes kyi bdag nyid skyes bu'o; ;shes bya'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ba ni shed bu dang / shed las skyes pa dang / tshor ba po dang / byed pa po dang / gnas kyi don dang / rang gi ngo bo can dang /
translated: and the nature of the agent.🔽The proponents of Īśvara say that Īśvara is the agent of all phenomena.”🔽The so-called “nature of the object of knowledge” is the self, the offspring of the powerful one, the experiencer, the agent, the meaning of the abode, the nature of its own entity,

original: @493a *// byed pa po nyid do //
analyzed: @493a *// byed pa po nyid do //
translated: and the nature of the agent.🔽The proponents of Īśvara say that Īśvara is the agent of all phenomena.”🔽The so-called “nature of the object of knowledge” is the self, the offspring of the powerful one, the experiencer, the agent, the meaning of the abode, the nature of its own entity,🔽and the nature of the agent.

original: dbang phyug tu smra ba rnams ni chos rnams kyi byed par dbang phyug 'dod do zhes zer ro //
analyzed: dbang phyug tu smra ba rnams ni chos rnams kyi byed par dbang phyug 'dod do zhes zer ro //
translated: The proponents of Īśvara say that Īśvara is the agent of all phenomena.”🔽The so-called “nature of the object of knowledge” is the self, the offspring of the powerful one, the experiencer, the agent, the meaning of the abode, the nature of its own entity,🔽and the nature of the agent.🔽The proponents of Īśvara say that Īśvara is the agent of all phenomena.”

original: chos can dngos po de nyid ces bya ba ni bdag nyid can de nyid grub pa'i mtha' las bsod nams la sogs pa'i chos rnams byed pa po'am /
analyzed: chos can dngos po de nyid ces bya ba ni bdag nyid can de nyid grub pa'i mtha' las bsod nams la sogs pa'i chos rnams byed pa po'am /
translated: The so-called “nature of the object of knowledge” is the self, the offspring of the powerful one, the experiencer, the agent, the meaning of the abode, the nature of its own entity,🔽and the nature of the agent.🔽The proponents of Īśvara say that Īśvara is the agent of all phenomena.”🔽The so-called

original: chos kyi ngo bor dbang phyug chen po 'dod de /
analyzed: chos kyi ngo bor dbang phyug chen po 'dod de /
translated: The great lord is asserted to be the nature of phenomena.

original: de rab tu bstan pa'i don du 'dis rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog par gsungs pa dang / gcig dang du ma dag dang / bsgrub par bya ba dag dang / chos can dag dang / gtan tshigs dang / dpe dag bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de rab tu bstan pa'i don du 'dis rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog par gsungs pa dang / gcig dang du ma dag dang / bsgrub par bya ba dag dang / chos can dag dang / gtan tshigs dang / dpe dag bka' stsal pa /
translated: In order to fully teach that, he states the pervasion and counter-pervasion, and he states the probandum, the subject, the reason, and the example.

original: chos rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / du mas zhes bya ba ni gal te du ma nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i rgyur brjod na du ma nyid mi skyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / du mas zhes bya ba ni gal te du ma nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i rgyur brjod na du ma nyid mi skyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He states, With regard to phenomena, etc., and If multiplicity is stated as the reason for the probandum, multiplicity is not produced.

original: 'dis gcig pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir brjod pas chu bo dang / rgya mtsho'i gnas kyis gnyis kyi'ang dpe brjod do //
analyzed: 'dis gcig pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir brjod pas chu bo dang / rgya mtsho'i gnas kyis gnyis kyi'ang dpe brjod do //
translated: Since he states this for the sake of proving singularity, he states the example of both the river and the ocean.

original: 'dis gcig dang du ma dag gis sgrub pa'i phyir dper brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dis gcig dang du ma dag gis sgrub pa'i phyir dper brjod par bya ste /
translated: He states this as an example for proving singularity and multiplicity.

original: re la re zhig du ma'i chos rnams kyi mthar brjod pa'i sems la sogs pa'i dngos po du ma ni mang po nyid de /
analyzed: re la re zhig du ma'i chos rnams kyi mthar brjod pa'i sems la sogs pa'i dngos po du ma ni mang po nyid de /
translated: First, with regard to many phenomena, the many things such as mind, etc., are multiplicity.

original: gang gi phyir gcig las log pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rim pa 'dis chos ni du mas ni zhes pa ni rgyus thams cad mu stegs pa'i sems la sogs pa'i rnam pa du mar 'dod do //🔽ci bcom @493b ldan 'das /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gcig las log pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rim pa 'dis chos ni du mas ni zhes pa ni rgyus thams cad mu stegs pa'i sems la sogs pa'i rnam pa du mar 'dod do // ci bcom @493b ldan 'das /
translated: The word many refers to the various aspects of the mind of the tīrthikas, etc.

original: dmigs lags sam /
analyzed: dmigs lags sam /
translated: Then Subhūti asked, Blessed One, is there an object of perception?

original: bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied, Subhūti, it is like this:

original: chu bo'i rgyun ni zhes bya ba'i sgras ni nyan thos so //
analyzed: chu bo'i rgyun ni zhes bya ba'i sgras ni nyan thos so //
translated: The word stream refers to the śrāvakas.

original: rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni rol mtsho las phyi rol du ji lta bu chu bo sh'i ta dang; sindhu dang / gang g'a la sogs pa'i chu bo'i rgyun 'bab cing rab tu 'khor ba 'di ni sindhu'i chu bo'o //
analyzed: rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni rol mtsho las phyi rol du ji lta bu chu bo sh'i ta dang; sindhu dang / gang g'a la sogs pa'i chu bo'i rgyun 'bab cing rab tu 'khor ba 'di ni sindhu'i chu bo'o //
translated: The word ocean refers to the external ocean, just as the streams of the Śītā, Sindhu, Gaṅgā, and other rivers flow and circulate, this is the Sindhu river,🔽 this is the Gaṅgā river, it would not be perceived as various.

original: 'di ni gang g'a'i chu bo zhes sna tshogs nyid du dmigs par mi 'gyur ro; ;de bzhin du zab cing gting dpag dka' ba'i chos kyi dbyings las phyi rol tu gyur pa'i mu stegs can rnams kyi bdag dang / 'tsho ba dang / skyes bu dang /
analyzed: 'di ni gang g'a'i chu bo zhes sna tshogs nyid du dmigs par mi 'gyur ro; ;de bzhin du zab cing gting dpag dka' ba'i chos kyi dbyings las phyi rol tu gyur pa'i mu stegs can rnams kyi bdag dang / 'tsho ba dang / skyes bu dang /
translated: Similarly, from the profound and difficult-to-fathom dharmadhātu, the tīrthikas who have gone outside, with their self, life-force, person,

original: gang zag ces bya ba sna tshogs nyid do //
analyzed: gang zag ces bya ba sna tshogs nyid do //
translated: The person is just a variety.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: ci / 'dir de kho na nyid du ma'i rnam pa nyid lags sam /
analyzed: ci / 'dir de kho na nyid du ma'i rnam pa nyid lags sam /
translated: is it that here there are many aspects of reality?

original: bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bka' stsal pa /
translated: He replied,

original: ma yin no //
analyzed: ma yin no //
translated: No, they do not.🔽

original: gang zhig 'dir de kho na ni gcig tu mngon par 'dod de /
analyzed: gang zhig 'dir de kho na ni gcig tu mngon par 'dod de /
translated: Here, reality is asserted to be one.

original: de kho na nyid de'i ngo bo gcig par gsungs pa nyid do //
analyzed: de kho na nyid de'i ngo bo gcig par gsungs pa nyid do //
translated: The nature of reality is said to be one.

original: gang gi phyir gcig dang / mang po nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa las mang po nyid ces bya ba ni de rnams kyi sems la sogs pa gang zhig du ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa de ni dam pas dmigs par mi 'gyur zhing rigs pas rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gcig dang / mang po nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa las mang po nyid ces bya ba ni de rnams kyi sems la sogs pa gang zhig du ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa de ni dam pas dmigs par mi 'gyur zhing rigs pas rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Because of being one and many, etc., many is that which is manifold, the minds, etc. of those, which is not observed by the holy ones and is not understood by reasoning.

original: gang gi phyir du ma nyid ni gcig la 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir du ma nyid ni gcig la 'jug pa ste /
translated: Because many is included in one.

original: dper na / chu bo rnams kyi du ma nyid rgya mtshor 'jug pa ltar /🔽sems dang / bdag la sogs pa yod do zhes bya bar rigs pas rtogs @494a *//
analyzed: dper na / chu bo rnams kyi du ma nyid rgya mtshor 'jug pa ltar / sems dang / bdag la sogs pa yod do zhes bya bar rigs pas rtogs @494a *//
translated: For example, the many rivers are included in the ocean.

original: par mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: par mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: It is not understood by reasoning that the mind, self, etc. exist.

original: rigs pa yod pa dang lhan du zin kyang sems la sogs pa gang gi tshe chos thams cad bdag med par zhugs pa de'i tshe'ang /
analyzed: rigs pa yod pa dang lhan du zin kyang sems la sogs pa gang gi tshe chos thams cad bdag med par zhugs pa de'i tshe'ang /
translated: Even when the mind and so on exist along with the reason, when all phenomena are engaged in selflessness,

original: de rnams kyi sna tshogs nyid mi 'dod do //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sna tshogs nyid mi 'dod do //
translated: at that time, their diversity is not accepted.

original: dper na / rgya mtsho la chu bo du ma nyid zhugs pa'i so sor snang ba'i dngos po med do //
analyzed: dper na / rgya mtsho la chu bo du ma nyid zhugs pa'i so sor snang ba'i dngos po med do //
translated: For example, in the ocean, the many rivers are engaged, but the individual appearances of things do not exist.

original: de bzhin du du ma nyid kyi dngos po med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin du du ma nyid kyi dngos po med pa'i phyir /
translated: In the same way, because of the non-existence of the thing of multiplicity,

original: de kho na nyid gcig pa'i rnam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de kho na nyid gcig pa'i rnam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is realized as the aspect of the oneness of reality.

original: de de lta bu'i rnam pas gang las de kho na nyid rnyed par 'gyur ba lags //
analyzed: de de lta bu'i rnam pas gang las de kho na nyid rnyed par 'gyur ba lags //
translated: In what way is that reality to be found?

original: bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān replied:

original: bla ma'i zhal las zhes bya ba la bla ma ni sngags dang / rgyud dang / man ngag can te /
analyzed: bla ma'i zhal las zhes bya ba la bla ma ni sngags dang / rgyud dang / man ngag can te /
translated: From the guru's mouth. The guru is one who has mantras, tantras, and instructions.

original: gang zhig tshig gis man ngag rnyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang zhig tshig gis man ngag rnyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: From whom the instructions are obtained through words.

original: de'i man ngag nges par bstan pa bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de'i man ngag nges par bstan pa bka' stsal pa /
translated: The instructions of that [guru] are definitely taught.

original: nang gi zhes bya ba ni rtsa mdzes pa'i spyi bor ji lta bu'i gzugs kyis rnam par gnas pa dang / nam mkha' lnga yis brgyan par byas pa'o //
analyzed: nang gi zhes bya ba ni rtsa mdzes pa'i spyi bor ji lta bu'i gzugs kyis rnam par gnas pa dang / nam mkha' lnga yis brgyan par byas pa'o //
translated: The inner is the beautiful channel at the top, in the form of a stupa, and it is adorned with the five spaces.

original: gsang ba'i padma ni gsang ba'i gnas zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: gsang ba'i padma ni gsang ba'i gnas zhes gsungs te /
translated: The secret lotus is said to be the secret place.

original: padma'i lte bar rtsa mdzes pa'i spyi bo'i phyogs su khrag dang / khu ba dang / gci ba 'dzin pa'i rtsa lnga yis mdzes pa'i phyir spyi bo'i nam mkha'i gnas su'o //
analyzed: padma'i lte bar rtsa mdzes pa'i spyi bo'i phyogs su khrag dang / khu ba dang / gci ba 'dzin pa'i rtsa lnga yis mdzes pa'i phyir spyi bo'i nam mkha'i gnas su'o //
translated: In the center of the lotus, at the top of the beautiful channel, the five channels that hold blood, semen, and excrement are beautiful, so it is in the space of the top.

original: yang na chu dang / me dang / dbang chen dang / rlung dang / bsil ba dang / tsha ba dang / gnyis kyis tsha ba'i mtshan nyid dang / 'dod chags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs pas @494b nam mkha' lnga po 'di rnams kyi brgyan par byas pa ste /
analyzed: yang na chu dang / me dang / dbang chen dang / rlung dang / bsil ba dang / tsha ba dang / gnyis kyis tsha ba'i mtshan nyid dang / 'dod chags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs pas @494b nam mkha' lnga po 'di rnams kyi brgyan par byas pa ste /
translated: Or, the five spaces are adorned with water, fire, earth, wind, coolness, heat, and the characteristics of both, and by entering the mandala of passion,

original: padma 'ba' zhig gis brgyan pa ni ma yin no zhes bka' stsal to //
analyzed: padma 'ba' zhig gis brgyan pa ni ma yin no zhes bka' stsal to //
translated: it is said that it is adorned with just the lotus, not with anything else.

original: gsang ba zhes bya ba ni don rnam pa bdun te /
analyzed: gsang ba zhes bya ba ni don rnam pa bdun te /
translated: The secret is sevenfold.

original: brgyad pa ni brjod du med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: brgyad pa ni brjod du med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The eighth is the characteristic of the inexpressible.

original: gsang ba zhes bya ba ni mi gsal ba'o //
analyzed: gsang ba zhes bya ba ni mi gsal ba'o //
translated: The secret is the unclear.

original: der gsang ba de nyid phyogs yin te /
analyzed: der gsang ba de nyid phyogs yin te /
translated: There, the secret itself is the direction.

original: de kho na nyid mdor bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid mdor bstan pa'o //
translated: This is the summary of reality.

original: gsang ba ni sa bon lnga'o //
analyzed: gsang ba ni sa bon lnga'o //
translated: The secret is the five seeds.

original: gsang ba ni dam pa'i dngos po sbas pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba ni dam pa'i dngos po sbas pa'o //
translated: The secret is the hidden sacred thing.

original: gsang ba ni gsang ba'i padma'o //
analyzed: gsang ba ni gsang ba'i padma'o //
translated: The secret is the secret lotus.

original: gsang ba ni lte ba'i dga' ba'o //
analyzed: gsang ba ni lte ba'i dga' ba'o //
translated: The secret is the joy of the navel.

original: gsang ba ni thams cad du 'gro bo'o //
analyzed: gsang ba ni thams cad du 'gro bo'o //
translated: The secret is the all-pervading.

original: gsang ba ni bde ba thams cad mtha' yas pa ste //
analyzed: gsang ba ni bde ba thams cad mtha' yas pa ste //
translated: The secret is the infinite bliss of all.

original: rgyud kyi gzhung gis bshad do //
analyzed: rgyud kyi gzhung gis bshad do //
translated: It is explained by the text of the tantra.

original: gsang ba yang ni byang chub sems //
analyzed: gsang ba yang ni byang chub sems //
translated: The secret is also the enlightened mind.

original: gnyis pa thabs dang shes rab nyid //
analyzed: gnyis pa thabs dang shes rab nyid //
translated: The second is method and wisdom itself.

original: gsum pa yang ni snying rje ste //
analyzed: gsum pa yang ni snying rje ste //
translated: The third is also compassion.

original: bzhi pa snying po dam pa nyid //
analyzed: bzhi pa snying po dam pa nyid //
translated: The fourth is the sacred essence itself.

original: lnga pa mnyam pa nyid du gsungs //
analyzed: lnga pa mnyam pa nyid du gsungs //
translated: The fifth is said to be equality.

original: drug pa la ni byams pa nyid //
analyzed: drug pa la ni byams pa nyid //
translated: The sixth is love itself.

original: bdun pa chos nyid ye shes te //
analyzed: bdun pa chos nyid ye shes te //
translated: The seventh is the wisdom of reality.

original: 'di rnams gnas su kun tu bzhugs //
analyzed: 'di rnams gnas su kun tu bzhugs //
translated: These all abide in the places.

original: byang chub sems ni ma skyes pa //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni ma skyes pa //
translated: The bodhicitta that has not arisen

original: ting 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs mchog /
analyzed: ting 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs mchog /
translated: is the supreme variety of samādhi.

original: ming ni mdzes phyir rnam par bshad //
analyzed: ming ni mdzes phyir rnam par bshad //
translated: It is explained to be beautiful because of its name.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i dga' ma de //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i dga' ma de //
translated: That beloved of Vajrasattva

original: mang po'i gnas su gcig pu ste //
analyzed: mang po'i gnas su gcig pu ste //
translated: is the one in the abode of many.

original: de ni shes rab pha rol phyin //
analyzed: de ni shes rab pha rol phyin //
translated: She is the perfection of wisdom.

original: kun mkhyen kun 'gro thams cad pa //
analyzed: kun mkhyen kun 'gro thams cad pa //
translated: The omniscient one, the omnipresent one, the all-pervading one,

original: phra snying gsang ba'i mkha' 'gror 'gro /
analyzed: phra snying gsang ba'i mkha' 'gror 'gro /
translated: goes to the secret space of the subtle heart.

original: sgyu ma'i gzugs brgya rig pa'i phyir //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i gzugs brgya rig pa'i phyir //
translated: Because of knowing the hundred forms of illusion,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyis 'chad par byed //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyis 'chad par byed //
translated: all buddhas explain it.

original: me long la @495a *//
analyzed: me long la @495a *//
translated: Meditating on the mirror,

original: sogs sgom pa yis //
analyzed: sogs sgom pa yis //
translated: and so on,

original: sngags ni lnga po yang dag bshad //
analyzed: sngags ni lnga po yang dag bshad //
translated: the five mantras are explained.

original: shes rab pha rol phyin par gsungs //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin par gsungs //
translated: It is said to be the perfection of wisdom.

original: yi ge dang po gcig gyur pa //
analyzed: yi ge dang po gcig gyur pa //
translated: The first syllable is the one.

original: me long la sogs bder gshegs lnga //
analyzed: me long la sogs bder gshegs lnga //
translated: The mirror, and so on, are the five sugatas.

original: drug pa dpal ldan bde chen po //
analyzed: drug pa dpal ldan bde chen po //
translated: The sixth is the glorious great bliss.

original: de yi yang ni ye shes gzhan //
analyzed: de yi yang ni ye shes gzhan //
translated: Beyond that is another gnosis.

original: dag pa steng du grags pa med //
analyzed: dag pa steng du grags pa med //
translated: It is pure, not known above.

original: rgyud ni 'bum phrag tshad du ni //
analyzed: rgyud ni 'bum phrag tshad du ni //
translated: The tantra is said to be one hundred thousand in size,

original: drug pa yod par ma gsungs so //
analyzed: drug pa yod par ma gsungs so //
translated: but the sixth is not mentioned.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' lta bu nyid //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' lta bu nyid //
translated: Is like Vajrasattva himself.

original: mi yi 'jig rten yod ma yin //
analyzed: mi yi 'jig rten yod ma yin //
translated: The world of humans does not exist.

original: de phyir nga yis khyod la bshad //
analyzed: de phyir nga yis khyod la bshad //
translated: Therefore, I explain to you

original: 'di nyid kyi ni nang son pas //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi ni nang son pas //
translated: That which is within this very [body].

original: gnyis med mnyam pa nyid du gang //
analyzed: gnyis med mnyam pa nyid du gang //
translated: The nondual equality🔽Was taught by the Bhagavān

original: sngon dang phyi mar bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: sngon dang phyi mar bcom ldan 'das //
translated: In the past and in the future

original: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs //
analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs //
translated: By glorious Vajrasattva.

original: 'di la slob dpon gyis thams cad du 'gro ba'i ye shes ji lta bu lags /
analyzed: 'di la slob dpon gyis thams cad du 'gro ba'i ye shes ji lta bu lags /
translated: Here, the master should ask, “What is the gnosis that goes everywhere?”

original: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs /
analyzed: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs /
translated: “The nature of everything always exists.

original: gnas ni rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs //
analyzed: gnas ni rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs //
translated: The place is said to be of four kinds.

original: bzhi ni cha dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: bzhi ni cha dang yang dag ldan //
translated: The four are endowed with parts.

original: padma bzhi la rnam par gnas //
analyzed: padma bzhi la rnam par gnas //
translated: It exists in the four lotuses.

original: spyi bo med snying padmar gnas //🔽kha yi padma'i spyi bor gnas //
analyzed: spyi bo med snying padmar gnas // kha yi padma'i spyi bor gnas //
translated: It exists in the lotus of the heart without a top.🔽It exists at the top of the lotus of the mouth.

original: lte ba'i padmar gnas pa'i sgra //
analyzed: lte ba'i padmar gnas pa'i sgra //
translated: The sound that exists in the lotus of the navel

original: sgra mthar gsang ba'i padmar ni //
analyzed: sgra mthar gsang ba'i padmar ni //
translated: At the end of sound, in the secret lotus,

original: 'gro dang rjes su 'ong bar byed //
analyzed: 'gro dang rjes su 'ong bar byed //
translated: It goes and comes back.

original: thig le'i sbyor bas rab tu bskor //
analyzed: thig le'i sbyor bas rab tu bskor //
translated: It is completely surrounded by the union of the bindu.

original: kha dog gnag dang dmar ba dang // mdog dkar de bzhin ser ba nyid //
analyzed: kha dog gnag dang dmar ba dang // mdog dkar de bzhin ser ba nyid //
translated: Black, red, white, and likewise yellow,

original: cha ni bcom ldan thig le'i gzugs //
analyzed: cha ni bcom ldan thig le'i gzugs //
translated: the parts are the form of the bindu of the Bhagavān.

original: cha ni shes rab cha zhes gsungs //
analyzed: cha ni shes rab cha zhes gsungs //
translated: The parts are said to be the parts of wisdom.

original: lha mo sgra ni rnam @495b nges bstan //
analyzed: lha mo sgra ni rnam @495b nges bstan //
translated: The goddess is taught to be the sound of space.

original: gang de rig ma sgyu ma che //
analyzed: gang de rig ma sgyu ma che //
translated: She is the great illusion of the knowledge consort.

original: sna tshogs gzugs can mtha' yas ma //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs can mtha' yas ma //
translated: She has a form of variety and is endless.

original: 'byin cing sdug dang 'jigs dang chags //
analyzed: 'byin cing sdug dang 'jigs dang chags //
translated: She emits, attracts, terrifies, and delights.

original: thig le'i sgra ni yongs su bskor //
analyzed: thig le'i sgra ni yongs su bskor //
translated: The sound of the bindu is completely surrounding.🔽The eighty-four thousand aggregates of Dharma

original: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dang // bzhi stong gi ni cho gas ni //
analyzed: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dang // bzhi stong gi ni cho gas ni //
translated: are the method of the body.

original: lus kyi de nyid mi shes pas //
analyzed: lus kyi de nyid mi shes pas //
translated: Since the reality of the body is not known,

original: de dag thams cad 'bras bu med //
analyzed: de dag thams cad 'bras bu med //
translated: all of that is fruitless.

original: yig 'bru rnams kyi dang po aa //
analyzed: yig 'bru rnams kyi dang po aa //
translated: The first of the syllables is a.

original: brtan dang g-yo ba rnams la gnas //
analyzed: brtan dang g-yo ba rnams la gnas //
translated: It is present in all that is moving and unmoving.

original: snying rje chen po reg 'byung //
analyzed: snying rje chen po reg 'byung //
translated: It arises from the touch of great compassion.

original: kha ni 'og tu nam mkha'i 'byed //
analyzed: kha ni 'og tu nam mkha'i 'byed //
translated: The opening is below, the space of the sky.

original: thog ma tha ma med pa'i lha //
analyzed: thog ma tha ma med pa'i lha //
translated: The deity is without beginning or end.

original: de yi spyi bo nges par bstan //
analyzed: de yi spyi bo nges par bstan //
translated: Its crown is taught to be

original: mchog gi de nyid 'da dag ni //
analyzed: mchog gi de nyid 'da dag ni //
translated: the supreme reality.

original: lha mo nga yis rab tu phye //
analyzed: lha mo nga yis rab tu phye //
translated: Goddess, I have fully opened🔽this supreme reality.

original: 'di nyid las ni thams cad 'byung //
analyzed: 'di nyid las ni thams cad 'byung //
translated: Everything comes from this.

original: chos kyi dbyings ni brum du brjod //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ni brum du brjod //
translated: The dharmadhātu is said to be bhrūṃ.

original: skye gnas dbus su rnam par gnas //
analyzed: skye gnas dbus su rnam par gnas //
translated: It abides in the middle of the birthplace.

original: mthar ni sv'ah'a zhes bya'i phyir //
analyzed: mthar ni sv'ah'a zhes bya'i phyir //
translated: In the end, it is svāhā.

original: bsdus nas zhes ni rnam par brjod //
analyzed: bsdus nas zhes ni rnam par brjod //
translated: Therefore, it is said to be “collected.”

original: rus pa rkang dang khu ba nyid //
analyzed: rus pa rkang dang khu ba nyid //
translated: Bones, marrow, and semen

original: pha las skyes pa gsum du gsungs //
analyzed: pha las skyes pa gsum du gsungs //
translated: are said to be the three that arise from the father.

original: pags pa dang ni sha dang khrag /🔽ma las skyes pa gsum du grags //
analyzed: pags pa dang ni sha dang khrag / ma las skyes pa gsum du grags //
translated: Skin, flesh, and blood🔽are known as the three that arise from the mother.

original: 'di dag tsam du gsungs pa rnams //
analyzed: 'di dag tsam du gsungs pa rnams //
translated: These are said to be

original: gong bu rnams ni bsdus pa nyid //
analyzed: gong bu rnams ni bsdus pa nyid //
translated: the mere aggregates.🔽Form, feeling, perception,

original: gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // 'du byed dang ni rnam shes nyid //
analyzed: gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // 'du byed dang ni rnam shes nyid //
translated: formation, and consciousness

original: sangs rgyas lnga yi gzugs brnyan dngos //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga yi gzugs brnyan dngos //
translated: are the actual reflections of the five buddhas.

original: phung po dag ces bsgrags par bya //
analyzed: phung po dag ces bsgrags par bya //
translated: They are proclaimed to be the aggregates.

original: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni //
analyzed: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni //
translated: Form, sound, smell,

original: ro dang yang ni reg bya nyid //
analyzed: ro dang yang ni reg bya nyid //
translated: taste, and also texture

original: chos kyi khams zhes rnam par bshad //
analyzed: chos kyi khams zhes rnam par bshad //
translated: are explained to be the element of phenomena.

original: khams rnams dang ni skye mched rnams //
analyzed: khams rnams dang ni skye mched rnams //
translated: The elements and the sense bases🔽are the actual reflections of the five buddhas.

original: 'di @496a *// rnams las ni byung ba yi //🔽khu ba las ni gong bu skye //
analyzed: 'di @496a *// rnams las ni byung ba yi // khu ba las ni gong bu skye //
translated: From these,🔽the embryo arises from the semen.

original: gong bu las ni mi rnams 'byung //
analyzed: gong bu las ni mi rnams 'byung //
translated: From the embryo, humans arise.

original: yid ni nam mkha'i khams kun tu //
analyzed: yid ni nam mkha'i khams kun tu //
translated: The mind is in all the elements of space.

original: skye mched dang ni khams rnams dang // dbang po phung po 'byung ba dang // khams rnams las ni byung ba yi //
analyzed: skye mched dang ni khams rnams dang // dbang po phung po 'byung ba dang // khams rnams las ni byung ba yi //
translated: The sense bases, the elements, the faculties, the aggregates, and the elements

original: dkyil 'khor lus su gsungs pa ste //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor lus su gsungs pa ste //
translated: are said to be the body mandala.

original: dkyil 'khor bha gar brjod pa nyid //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bha gar brjod pa nyid //
translated: The mandala is said to be the bhaga.

original: dkyil 'khor yang ni byang chub sems //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor yang ni byang chub sems //
translated: The mandala is also the bodhicitta.

original: dkyil 'khor gsum ni brtag par bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gsum ni brtag par bya //
translated: The three mandalas should be examined.

original: gang la gtso bo kun spyod pa //
analyzed: gang la gtso bo kun spyod pa //
translated: Wherever the principal one acts,

original: brtag pa du mar kun du gyur //
analyzed: brtag pa du mar kun du gyur //
translated: it becomes many kinds of examinations.

original: phung po rnam pa gnyis su gsungs //
analyzed: phung po rnam pa gnyis su gsungs //
translated: The aggregates are said to be twofold.

original: 'byung ba rig par rtag tu brtag /
analyzed: 'byung ba rig par rtag tu brtag /
translated: The elements should always be examined with knowledge.

original: myos byed dang ni lcags kyu nyid //
analyzed: myos byed dang ni lcags kyu nyid //
translated: Intoxication and the hook,🔽the noose, the lotus, the goad,

original: zhags pa padma gzhug byed dang // bcing ba lcags sgrog dril bu yang //
analyzed: zhags pa padma gzhug byed dang // bcing ba lcags sgrog dril bu yang //
translated: the fetter, the chain, and the bell

original: nges par byed pa ru ni gsungs //
analyzed: nges par byed pa ru ni gsungs //
translated: are said to be the definitive acts.

original: bshad pa dkar po zhes byar gsungs //
analyzed: bshad pa dkar po zhes byar gsungs //
translated: The explanation is said to be the white one.

original: padma zhes bya khrag tu gsungs //
analyzed: padma zhes bya khrag tu gsungs //
translated: The one called Padma is said to be blood.

original: sha zhes bya ba mar me nyid //
analyzed: sha zhes bya ba mar me nyid //
translated: The one called Sha is a lamp.

original: khu pa nam mkha' nyid du brjod //
analyzed: khu pa nam mkha' nyid du brjod //
translated: Khum is said to be space.

original: thim pa'i phyir na ling gar gsungs //
analyzed: thim pa'i phyir na ling gar gsungs //
translated: Because of dissolving, it is said to be a corpse.

original: me tog snyim pa bha gar brjod //
analyzed: me tog snyim pa bha gar brjod //
translated: The flower is said to be the bhaga.

original: glu ni langs pa nyid kyi glu //
analyzed: glu ni langs pa nyid kyi glu //
translated: The song is the song of the arising.

original: gar ni mnyam par sbyor ba nyid //
analyzed: gar ni mnyam par sbyor ba nyid //
translated: The dance is the union.

original: ro ni shi bar brjod pa nyid //
analyzed: ro ni shi bar brjod pa nyid //
translated: The taste is said to be death.

original: kha ni zhal dang bug pa nyid //
analyzed: kha ni zhal dang bug pa nyid //
translated: The mouth is the face and the opening.

original: snying po ro bsreg dur khrod do //
analyzed: snying po ro bsreg dur khrod do //
translated: The essence is the cremation ground.

original: me ni byin za gsal ba dang // de bzhin du ni 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: me ni byin za gsal ba dang // de bzhin du ni 'bar ba'o //
translated: The fire is the fire of the sacrificial pit, the illumination, and likewise, the blazing.

original: gur ni gu gul du brjod pa'o //🔽nag po'i 'byung po'i nyi ma ni //
analyzed: gur ni gu gul du brjod pa'o // nag po'i 'byung po'i nyi ma ni //
translated: The tent is said to be the incense.🔽The day of the black ghost

original: mar gyi ngo yi @496b bcu bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: mar gyi ngo yi @496b bcu bzhi pa'o //
translated: is the fourteenth of the dark half of the month.

original: gser shing ni da du ra'o //
analyzed: gser shing ni da du ra'o //
translated: The golden tree is the pomegranate.

original: aa lam ka ni ldong ros so //
analyzed: aa lam ka ni ldong ros so //
translated: Alamka is antimony.

original: ma ru lung ga sa bon gang ba'o //
analyzed: ma ru lung ga sa bon gang ba'o //
translated: Marula is the seed of the mango.

original: tsi tra ka ni tsi tra ka'o //
analyzed: tsi tra ka ni tsi tra ka'o //
translated: Citraka is the plant Citraka.

original: ba tsa ni tshig nyid do //
analyzed: ba tsa ni tshig nyid do //
translated: Vacana is the word.

original: khyim bya'i sgo nga thams cad ni khyim bya'i sgo nga'i dum bu'o //
analyzed: khyim bya'i sgo nga thams cad ni khyim bya'i sgo nga'i dum bu'o //
translated: All the eggs of the hen are the pieces of the hen’s egg.

original: skya bo ni dkar po'o //
analyzed: skya bo ni dkar po'o //
translated: Pale means white.

original: rta gsod pa ni ka ra bi ra'o //
analyzed: rta gsod pa ni ka ra bi ra'o //
translated: Horse-killer is karavira.

original: nyi ma'i ljon shing ni aarga'i shing ngo //
analyzed: nyi ma'i ljon shing ni aarga'i shing ngo //
translated: Sun-tree is arjuna.

original: be chag pa ni chag pa dang srog chags zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: be chag pa ni chag pa dang srog chags zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Broken bamboo is bamboo and animal.

original: sdig pa ni sbrul lo //
analyzed: sdig pa ni sbrul lo //
translated: Sin is snake.

original: aa lam ni rnga ma'o //
analyzed: aa lam ni rnga ma'o //
translated: Alambu is tail.

original: ka la pa ni cha'o //
analyzed: ka la pa ni cha'o //
translated: Kalapana is water.

original: nyin phyed kyi 'o mas byug cing zhes bya ba ni yang bsgos pa'o //
analyzed: nyin phyed kyi 'o mas byug cing zhes bya ba ni yang bsgos pa'o //
translated: Anointed with midday milk means smeared again.

original: ba na ri ni ka pi'o //
analyzed: ba na ri ni ka pi'o //
translated: Vanari is kapika.

original: yul ni ka tstshur brjod do //
analyzed: yul ni ka tstshur brjod do //
translated: The country is called Kacchur.

original: de'i bdag nyid ni thod le skor dang / spre'u dang / kha ti ka nyin phyed kyi 'o ma'i nang du nyi ma bdun du bzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid ni thod le skor dang / spre'u dang / kha ti ka nyin phyed kyi 'o ma'i nang du nyi ma bdun du bzhag par bya'o //
translated: Its nature is to be placed in midday milk for seven days, with a skull, a monkey, and a katikata.

original: de dag dang / nyin phyed kyi'o ma dag dang sbyar bas mgo bo'i dbang po dri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de dag dang / nyin phyed kyi'o ma dag dang sbyar bas mgo bo'i dbang po dri bar bya'o //
translated: By combining those with midday milk, the head sense-faculty is made fragrant.

original: dug sbyin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni reg pa las skye bar byed pa'i don to //
analyzed: dug sbyin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni reg pa las skye bar byed pa'i don to //
translated: It becomes a poison-giver means it causes birth from contact.

original: ma la ya las byung ba ni tsandan no //
analyzed: ma la ya las byung ba ni tsandan no //
translated: Born from Malaya is sandalwood.

original: n'a ga ge sar ni n'a ga'o //
analyzed: n'a ga ge sar ni n'a ga'o //
translated: Naga-essence is naga.

original: nad kyi dbang po ni ru rta'o //
analyzed: nad kyi dbang po ni ru rta'o //
translated: The lord of disease is the ruru deer.

original: myos byed kyi 'bras bu ni tsher ma'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: myos byed kyi 'bras bu ni tsher ma'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: The fruit of intoxication is the fruit of the thorn-apple.

original: dza gu'i yul ni myos byed kyi spro bar rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: dza gu'i yul ni myos byed kyi spro bar rtogs par bya'o //
translated: The land of Jaguda should be understood as the delight of intoxication.

original: ta ka ra ni dri'i ta ka ra'o //
analyzed: ta ka ra ni dri'i ta ka ra'o //
translated: The taka of scent is the taka of scent.

original: ldan pa ni sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: ldan pa ni sbyor ba'o //
translated: Possession is union.

original: 'bras kyi chu ni ko sha'o //
analyzed: 'bras kyi chu ni ko sha'o //
translated: The water of rice is the water of rice.

original: ji snyed pa'i drug sna tshogs ni du ma'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: ji snyed pa'i drug sna tshogs ni du ma'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The six of all kinds is the many kinds.

original: 'jig par byed do zhes bya ba ni zad par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'jig par byed do zhes bya ba ni zad par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It destroys means it causes to perish.

original: de'i nyin par skyes pa ni de'i nyin @497a *//🔽par shi ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i nyin par skyes pa ni de'i nyin @497a *// par shi ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Born on that day means dying on that day.

original: byis pa ni bu chung ngo //
analyzed: byis pa ni bu chung ngo //
translated: The child is the infant.

original: ro tsa ni bshang ba'o //
analyzed: ro tsa ni bshang ba'o //
translated: The rocana is feces.

original: ta ka ra ni klu'i shing ngo //
analyzed: ta ka ra ni klu'i shing ngo //
translated: The taka is the naga tree.

original: snying po'i gnas ni bcug par byas bya'o; ;sbal pa ni snying po can no //
analyzed: snying po'i gnas ni bcug par byas bya'o; ;sbal pa ni snying po can no //
translated: The abode of the essence is the place of insertion. The frog is the essence.

original: sbrul mgo gnyis pa ni lto 'phye mgo gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: sbrul mgo gnyis pa ni lto 'phye mgo gnyis pa'o //
translated: The two-headed snake is the two-headed naga.

original: khrag dang / tshil bu skol ba ni snum du brjod do //
analyzed: khrag dang / tshil bu skol ba ni snum du brjod do //
translated: The boiling of blood and marrow is said to be the oil.

original: ba ru ra'i shing ni de'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: ba ru ra'i shing ni de'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: The tree of the bāruṇa is its fruit.

original: lag pa ni phyag go /
analyzed: lag pa ni phyag go /
translated: The hand is the arm.

original: dug gis zin pa 'jig par byed do zhes bya ba ni zin pa 'phrog par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dug gis zin pa 'jig par byed do zhes bya ba ni zin pa 'phrog par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It destroys the one seized by poison means it steals the one seized.

original: ba lang gi mar ni ba'i mar ro //
analyzed: ba lang gi mar ni ba'i mar ro //
translated: The ghee of a cow is the ghee of a cow.

original: rdo rje can ni snu ha'i 'o ma'o //
analyzed: rdo rje can ni snu ha'i 'o ma'o //
translated: The vajra-holder is the milk of a snuhi.

original: ba hr'i ni rma bya'o //
analyzed: ba hr'i ni rma bya'o //
translated: The peacock is the bharī.

original: khrag ni rma skyes so //
analyzed: khrag ni rma skyes so //
translated: The blood is the blood of a rma.

original: sbrul mgo gnyis pa'i sha ni sha'o //
analyzed: sbrul mgo gnyis pa'i sha ni sha'o //
translated: The flesh of a two-headed snake is the flesh of a śa.

original: ba la ka'i rtsa ba cha bdun pa ni bdun gyi dum bu'o //
analyzed: ba la ka'i rtsa ba cha bdun pa ni bdun gyi dum bu'o //
translated: The root of the seven-part vṛka is the seven-part.

original: aom badzra ka ra h'um phat/
analyzed: aom badzra ka ra h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ vajra kara hūṃ phaṭ.

original: 'byung po 'dus pa'i sgras 'byung po mthar byed pa ni 'byung po nyid du rab tu grags so //
analyzed: 'byung po 'dus pa'i sgras 'byung po mthar byed pa ni 'byung po nyid du rab tu grags so //
translated: The one who ends the bhūtas by the sound of the assembled bhūtas is well known as a bhūta.

original: lag pa g-yas par btags na gdon las thar bar byed de //
analyzed: lag pa g-yas par btags na gdon las thar bar byed de //
translated: If it is tied to the right arm, it liberates from possession.

original: gzhan du na ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du na ma yin no //
translated: Otherwise, it is not.

original: lto 'a phye'i dbang po ni sbrul gyi rgyal po'o //
analyzed: lto 'a phye'i dbang po ni sbrul gyi rgyal po'o //
translated: The lord of the nāgas is the king of the nāgas.

original: shun pa ni bshus pa'o //
analyzed: shun pa ni bshus pa'o //
translated: The bark is the skin.

original: lto 'phye'i dgra ni rma bya ste de'i gshog pa'o //
analyzed: lto 'phye'i dgra ni rma bya ste de'i gshog pa'o //
translated: The enemy of the nāgas is the peacock, its feathers.

original: khva gnyis ni khva'o //
analyzed: khva gnyis ni khva'o //
translated: The two crows are the crows.

original: nyin mo 'jigs pa ni 'ug pa'o //
analyzed: nyin mo 'jigs pa ni 'ug pa'o //
translated: The daytime terror is an owl.

original: rta ni 'gro mgyogs so //
analyzed: rta ni 'gro mgyogs so //
translated: A horse is fast-moving.

original: rmig pa ni rkang pa'o //
analyzed: rmig pa ni rkang pa'o //
translated: A hoof is a foot.

original: khung bu ni bug pa'o //
analyzed: khung bu ni bug pa'o //
translated: A hole is a cavity.

original: bzhag pa ni bcug pa'o //🔽sbrul ni lto 'phye'o //
analyzed: bzhag pa ni bcug pa'o // sbrul ni lto 'phye'o //
translated: To place is to insert.🔽A snake is a python.

original: gnod sbyin ni khyi'o //🔽thod pa ni rmod byed do //
analyzed: gnod sbyin ni khyi'o // thod pa ni rmod byed do //
translated: A yaksha is a dog.🔽A skull is a plow.

original: phag ni phag @497b pa'o; ;mgo skyes ni skra'o //
analyzed: phag ni phag @497b pa'o; ;mgo skyes ni skra'o //
translated: A pig is a pig. Body hair is hair.

original: mgrin ring ni rnga mo'o //
analyzed: mgrin ring ni rnga mo'o //
translated: A camel is a long-necked animal.

original: dmar po ni khrag go /
analyzed: dmar po ni khrag go /
translated: Red is blood.

original: bha la ta ka nyid dang / star bu ni aam la be ta nyid do //
analyzed: bha la ta ka nyid dang / star bu ni aam la be ta nyid do //
translated: Bhallataka is a kind of myrobalan, and asafoetida is asafoetida itself.

original: lag skyes ni sen mo'o //
analyzed: lag skyes ni sen mo'o //
translated: A hand-born is a fingernail.

original: kha sbyor gyi me ni kha sbyar gyi 'tshed pa'o //
analyzed: kha sbyor gyi me ni kha sbyar gyi 'tshed pa'o //
translated: A mouth-fire is a mouth-cooking.

original: bsregs pa ni thal par byas pa'o //
analyzed: bsregs pa ni thal par byas pa'o //
translated: To burn is to reduce to ashes.

original: aam ko ta ni aam ko ta'i shing ngo //
analyzed: aam ko ta ni aam ko ta'i shing ngo //
translated: Amkota is an amkota tree.

original: dri zhim pa ni ba glang ngo //
analyzed: dri zhim pa ni ba glang ngo //
translated: Sweet-smelling is a cow.

original: aam ko ta'i sa bon btus pa'i mar khu des grub pa'i mig sman 'o ma dang bsres pas mig sman des mig byugs par bya'o //
analyzed: aam ko ta'i sa bon btus pa'i mar khu des grub pa'i mig sman 'o ma dang bsres pas mig sman des mig byugs par bya'o //
translated: With the oil extracted from amkota seeds, one should prepare an ointment and mix it with milk. With that ointment, one should anoint one's eyes.

original: rgyal ni skar ma rgyal lo //
analyzed: rgyal ni skar ma rgyal lo //
translated: The constellation Pushya is the Pushya constellation.

original: aam ko ta'i mar khu'i rtsigs ma dang / ta ka ra'i 'bras bu dang / aam ko ta'i sa bon gyi mar khu dang / gang zhig gnyis ka'i rtsigs ma dag gis mig byugs na lha'i gzugs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: aam ko ta'i mar khu'i rtsigs ma dang / ta ka ra'i 'bras bu dang / aam ko ta'i sa bon gyi mar khu dang / gang zhig gnyis ka'i rtsigs ma dag gis mig byugs na lha'i gzugs su 'gyur ro //
translated: The ointment of Amkota oil, the fruit of Takara, the oil of Amkota seeds, and the ointment of both roots will make one's eyes divine.

original: ta ka ra'i 'bras bu'i mig sman gyis byugs na sngar gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur te /
analyzed: ta ka ra'i 'bras bu'i mig sman gyis byugs na sngar gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur te /
translated: The ointment of Takara fruit will restore one's former nature.

original: rang gi ngo bo nyid can du mthong ngo //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo nyid can du mthong ngo //
translated: One will be seen as one's own nature.

original: ri bong can gyi chu ni se ba la'o //
analyzed: ri bong can gyi chu ni se ba la'o //
translated: The water of the moon is the water of the moonstone.

original: dza lu ka ni padma nyid do //
analyzed: dza lu ka ni padma nyid do //
translated: The Jāluka is the lotus itself.

original: sbal pa'i m'ar khu ni snying po can gyi mar khu'o //
analyzed: sbal pa'i m'ar khu ni snying po can gyi mar khu'o //
translated: The oil of the frog is the oil of the essence.

original: pa ta la'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig go /
analyzed: pa ta la'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig go /
translated: Together with the root of the Pātala.

original: dge sbyong ni skra bregs pa'o //
analyzed: dge sbyong ni skra bregs pa'o //
translated: The ascetic is one who shaves his head.

original: zla ba las byung ba ni se ba las byung ba'o //
analyzed: zla ba las byung ba ni se ba las byung ba'o //
translated: The one born from the moon is born from the moonstone.

original: dun dhu bha ni sprul gdong gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: dun dhu bha ni sprul gdong gnyis pa'o //
translated: The Dundubha is the two-faced snake.

original: khrag ni gzugs 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: khrag ni gzugs 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The blood is the one who holds form.

original: gos kyi nang du gzhug par byas nas khar gzhug go /
analyzed: gos kyi nang du gzhug par byas nas khar gzhug go /
translated: Having placed it inside the cloth, one should place it in the mouth.

original: sye na ka zhes bya ba'i shing ngo //
analyzed: sye na ka zhes bya ba'i shing ngo //
translated: The tree called Syenaka.

original: mar sar ni mar dkar nyid do //
analyzed: mar sar ni mar dkar nyid do //
translated: Ghee is clarified butter.

original: dmar po'i btsag ni gser kyi btsag go /
analyzed: dmar po'i btsag ni gser kyi btsag go /
translated: Red ochre is gold ochre.

original: dri ngan pa zhes bya ba ni sman @498a *//
analyzed: dri ngan pa zhes bya ba ni sman @498a *//
translated: Bad smell is medicine.

original: no; ;mi na ni nya'o //
analyzed: no; ;mi na ni nya'o //
translated: Not sick is fish.

original: srin bu ni shing gi rjes su rgyu ba'i 'bu srin no //🔽ko ki la ni sbrang bu'o //
analyzed: srin bu ni shing gi rjes su rgyu ba'i 'bu srin no // ko ki la ni sbrang bu'o //
translated: Insects are worms that move in wood.🔽Cockchafers are bees.

original: bu ram ni gu ta nyid do //
analyzed: bu ram ni gu ta nyid do //
translated: Sugar is jaggery.

original: aa ran la ni sings po'o //
analyzed: aa ran la ni sings po'o //
translated: Aranala is flour.

original: skye ba gnyis pa ni bram ze'o //
analyzed: skye ba gnyis pa ni bram ze'o //
translated: Second birth is a brahmin.

original: byi la ni rtug pa sbed pa'o //
analyzed: byi la ni rtug pa sbed pa'o //
translated: Cat is a hidden fart.

original: spre'u ni ba ra na'o //
analyzed: spre'u ni ba ra na'o //
translated: Monkey is a baboon.

original: rang 'chod pa ni g-yung po'o //
analyzed: rang 'chod pa ni g-yung po'o //
translated: Self-restraint is a eunuch.

original: khva'i dgra ni 'ug pa'o //
analyzed: khva'i dgra ni 'ug pa'o //
translated: Enemy of the crow is an owl.

analyzed: lha'i bdag po'i sbas pa ni dbang po sbas pa'o //

analyzed: ba bla ni man shi la'o //

analyzed: ldong ros ni ldong ros ljang gu'o; ;au kra ni ba ts'a'o //

analyzed: btsad nas skyes pa ni dur ba'o //

original: bkra shis ni ro tsa na'o //
analyzed: bkra shis ni ro tsa na'o //

analyzed: bam sa zhes bya ba ni lte ba mngon par sar pa'o //

analyzed: dbang po'i nas ni ku ta dza'i sa bon te /

analyzed: la la dag gi ku ta dza'i sa bon no //

analyzed: dpal thams cad ni mdzes pa dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: aa ru n'a ni tsandan dmar po'o //

analyzed: drang srong gi bu ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' skyed pa'o //

analyzed: ri'i snying po ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o //

original: spo da ni rna ba'i mig sman no //
analyzed: spo da ni rna ba'i mig sman no //

original: ri bong gis mtshan pa'i tsher ma ni se pa la'i tshe ma'o //
analyzed: ri bong gis mtshan pa'i tsher ma ni se pa la'i tshe ma'o //

analyzed: sbrang rtsi ni sbrang ma'i'o //

analyzed: sbrang rtsi ni yashta'i sbrang rtsi'o //

analyzed: dang po'i me tog ni dang po'i zla mtshan gyi khrag go /

analyzed: lcags gsum zhes bya ba ni gser dang / dngul dang / zangs so //

original: sngon po nyid kyis nye bar mtshon cing sbyar ba'i aa sho ka'i shing ni aa sho ka sngon po'o //
analyzed: sngon po nyid kyis nye bar mtshon cing sbyar ba'i aa sho ka'i shing ni aa sho ka sngon po'o //

analyzed: de las byung ba'i myu gu ni aa sho ka sngon po las byung ba'i myu gu'o //

original: nyi ma ni zangs te shin tu dmar ba'o //
analyzed: nyi ma ni zangs te shin tu dmar ba'o //
translated: The sun is copper, which is very red.

original: zla ba ni dngul lo //
analyzed: zla ba ni dngul lo //

original: me ni gser ro //
analyzed: me ni gser ro //

original: ba glang gi gi wang ni ba glang gi gi wang ngo //
analyzed: ba glang gi gi wang ni ba glang gi gi wang ngo //

original: aing gu di'i shing gi me tog ni aing gu di'i ljon shing gi ku su ma ste /
analyzed: aing gu di'i shing gi me tog ni aing gu di'i ljon shing gi ku su ma ste /

analyzed: ljon shing gi me tog kun bsdus pa'o // 'gegs pa ni skyes pa @499a *//

original: shi ba ste /
analyzed: shi ba ste /

original: de'i mig dang / spu rnams so //
analyzed: de'i mig dang / spu rnams so //

original: ka gnyis pas zos pa dang ldan pa ni khras zos pa skyugs pa dang lhag ma ma zos pa'o //
analyzed: ka gnyis pas zos pa dang ldan pa ni khras zos pa skyugs pa dang lhag ma ma zos pa'o //

original: pha'i skyed mos tshal ni dur khrod do //
analyzed: pha'i skyed mos tshal ni dur khrod do //

analyzed: der mnyes pa'i zla mtshan gyis myos pa'i bu mo'i rdzas blangs pa'o //

original: aa sho ka'ang yin la sngon po'ang yin pa de ni aa sho ka sngon po'o //
analyzed: aa sho ka'ang yin la sngon po'ang yin pa de ni aa sho ka sngon po'o //

original: de'i byang phyogs kyi khva'i tshang ni khva'i gnas so //
analyzed: de'i byang phyogs kyi khva'i tshang ni khva'i gnas so //

analyzed: de las gang zhig byung ba'i myu gu de ni aa sho ka sngon po'i byang phyogs kyi khva'i tshang gi myu gu'o //

original: phug ron gyi khong par sro ta aam dza na btsug la 'on kyang tsi ta'i mes bsreg par bya ste de nas mig sman 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phug ron gyi khong par sro ta aam dza na btsug la 'on kyang tsi ta'i mes bsreg par bya ste de nas mig sman 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: One should insert the root of the blue lotus into the breast of a pigeon, and then burn it with the fire of citraka. Then the eye ointment will be accomplished.

original: byi la dkar po ma yin pas bsad pa ni byi la nag po'i khrag gis mi snang bar byas te sbed pa skyed par byang pa'o //
analyzed: byi la dkar po ma yin pas bsad pa ni byi la nag po'i khrag gis mi snang bar byas te sbed pa skyed par byang pa'o //
translated: One should kill a black cat, not a white one, and make it invisible with the blood of the black cat.

original: tri na'i myu gu sar pa'i tshogs de rnams ni tri na'i myu gu sar ba'i tshogs rnams so //
analyzed: tri na'i myu gu sar pa'i tshogs de rnams ni tri na'i myu gu sar ba'i tshogs rnams so //
translated: The host of Triṇa sprouts is the host of Triṇa sprouts.

original: des bteg pa'i sa ni ta la'i myu gu sar pa'i tshogs kyis bteg pa'i sa'o //
analyzed: des bteg pa'i sa ni ta la'i myu gu sar pa'i tshogs kyis bteg pa'i sa'o //
translated: The earth that is lifted by that is the earth that is lifted by the host of Triṇa sprouts.

original: de'i steng du gnas pa'i sa dang / mda'i rma dang / ta la dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du gnas pa'i sa dang / mda'i rma dang / ta la dang ldan pa'o //

original: mda'i rma ni sbrang bu'o //
analyzed: mda'i rma ni sbrang bu'o //

original: ta la ni sdong ros so //🔽de dag dang yang dag par ldan pa ni bcas pa ste /
analyzed: ta la ni sdong ros so // de dag dang yang dag par ldan pa ni bcas pa ste /

original: sa ra ga dang / ta la dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: sa ra ga dang / ta la dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Endowed with those is the earth endowed with Sara and palm trees.

original: rgyal la zhes pa ni rgyal gyi nyi ma la'o //
analyzed: rgyal la zhes pa ni rgyal gyi nyi ma la'o //
translated: In the month of Jyeṣṭha means in the month of Jyeṣṭha.

original: mig sman ni gong du gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: mig sman ni gong du gsungs pa'o //
translated: The eye medicine is as previously stated.

original: gang zhig @499b sngags dang sman gyi sbyor bas legs par byas na de'i sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang zhig @499b sngags dang sman gyi sbyor bas legs par byas na de'i sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one performs well with the combination of mantra and medicine, one will accomplish it by that combination.

original: 'di dag ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las 'ongs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las 'ongs pa ste /

original: de nas bha ga dbus su bsgrub par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas bha ga dbus su bsgrub par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: Then, one should accomplish in the middle of the bhaga.

original: dang por phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs nas /
analyzed: dang por phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs nas /
translated: First, having blessed the consort,

original: phyi nas mig sman gyi sgrub pa bcug cing sbyor bas ji srid dngos grub gyi mtshan ma ma skyes kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o; ;gang zhig sngags kyi sgrub pa dang bral ba'i mig sman 'di 'ba' zhig gis zhi ba'i las la sogs pa'ang byed do //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: phyi nas mig sman gyi sgrub pa bcug cing sbyor bas ji srid dngos grub gyi mtshan ma ma skyes kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o; ;gang zhig sngags kyi sgrub pa dang bral ba'i mig sman 'di 'ba' zhig gis zhi ba'i las la sogs pa'ang byed do // zhes gsungs so //
translated: This eye ointment, which is devoid of mantra practice, also performs the activities of pacifying and so forth.

original: mig mig sman gyis byugs nas zhi ba la sogs pa'i lta stangs kyi bltas na zhi ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mig mig sman gyis byugs nas zhi ba la sogs pa'i lta stangs kyi bltas na zhi ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: One should anoint one’s eyes with the eye ointment and gaze with the gaze of pacifying and so forth.

original: mig mig sman gyis byugs nas rgyal po la bltas na rgyal po mchod pa rnyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mig mig sman gyis byugs nas rgyal po la bltas na rgyal po mchod pa rnyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: One should anoint one’s eyes with the eye ointment and gaze at the king. One will obtain royal worship.

original: mig mig sman gyis byugs nas khro bo'i lta bas dgra la bltas na dgra za bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mig mig sman gyis byugs nas khro bo'i lta bas dgra la bltas na dgra za bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One should anoint one’s eyes with the eye ointment and gaze at an enemy with an angry gaze. The enemy will be destroyed.

original: de bzhin du bgegs thams cad la nges par bltas na /
analyzed: de bzhin du bgegs thams cad la nges par bltas na /

original: gdon la sogs pa'i bgegs thams cad yang dag par skrod par byed do //
analyzed: gdon la sogs pa'i bgegs thams cad yang dag par skrod par byed do //
translated: All the vighnas, such as grahas, will be expelled.

original: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sngags kyis mngon par bsngags shing bzla bar bya'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sngags kyis mngon par bsngags shing bzla bar bya'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: One should recite the mantra that will be explained, and enchant it.

original: bud med kyi bha gar gur gum bcug nas phyi nas rang gi sgrub pa gzhug par bya zhing mnyam par sbyor bas sngags bzlas te phyad par du'ang bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: bud med kyi bha gar gur gum bcug nas phyi nas rang gi sgrub pa gzhug par bya zhing mnyam par sbyor bas sngags bzlas te phyad par du'ang bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Having placed saffron in the bhaga of a woman, one should place one’s own penis inside, and recite the mantra while in union. One should also practice during the day.

original: de'i sngags brjod pa bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de'i sngags brjod pa bka' stsal pa /
translated: He declares the mantra of that [woman]:

original: aom pra sanna t'a re /🔽@500a *// aa mri ta mu khi /
analyzed: aom pra sanna t'a re / @500a *// aa mri ta mu khi /
translated: Oṃ prasannatārā🔽amṛta-mukhi

original: aa mri ta lo tsa ne /
analyzed: aa mri ta lo tsa ne /

original: sarba aartha s'a dha ni /
analyzed: sarba aartha s'a dha ni /
translated: sarva-artha-sādhani

analyzed: sarba satva / ba sham ka ri h'um phat ham sv'ah'a /

original: aom ti mu khe shto bhu dze /
analyzed: aom ti mu khe shto bhu dze /
translated: Oṃ ti-mukha-ṣṭo-bhuje🔽devī-amāṅgaki-raudri-rūpiṇi hriṃ hriṃ hūṃ hūṃ āṃ āṃ hāṃ hāṃ

original: de bi m'a ma k'i roo dri r'u pi n'i hr'im hr'im h'um h'um a'am a'am h'a h'a /
analyzed: de bi m'a ma k'i roo dri r'u pi n'i hr'im hr'im h'um h'um a'am a'am h'a h'a /

analyzed: sv'ah'a / sngon gyi bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig bzlas nas /
translated: Having previously recited the approach [mantra] one hundred thousand times,

original: phyi nas mig sman dang / gur gum yang bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: phyi nas mig sman dang / gur gum yang bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: one should then practice the eye ointment and saffron.

original: zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa yin no //

original: gur gum des dpral bar thig le bya'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gur gum des dpral bar thig le bya'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: One should make a bindu on the forehead with saffron.

original: bud med skal pa bzang por byed pa bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bud med skal pa bzang por byed pa bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One taught the good fortune of women:

original: bha ga tsandan gyis byugs pa'i steng du ba glang gi gi hang gis brum bris nas; bdag po dang lhan cig sbyor bas ji srid myos byed ma 'ongs kyi bar du'o //
analyzed: bha ga tsandan gyis byugs pa'i steng du ba glang gi gi hang gis brum bris nas; bdag po dang lhan cig sbyor bas ji srid myos byed ma 'ongs kyi bar du'o //
translated: On top of the bhaga anointed with sandalwood, one should write with bull's blood, and through union with the master, as long as one does not become intoxicated.

original: de nas bdag po de bran bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas bdag po de bran bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: Then the master will become like a servant.

original: nri ba ni bung ba'i rgyal po'o //
analyzed: nri ba ni bung ba'i rgyal po'o //
translated: Nripa is the king of bees.

original: tsi ti ni 'dab ma stong pa'o //
analyzed: tsi ti ni 'dab ma stong pa'o //

original: mtshan mo ni yung ba'o //
analyzed: mtshan mo ni yung ba'o //
translated: Night is indigo.

original: ba ku tsi ni aa ba gu tsa'o //
analyzed: ba ku tsi ni aa ba gu tsa'o //

analyzed: autpa la'i snying po ni autpa la kha ma bye ba'o //

original: lcags kyi dri ma ni lcags kyi bshad pa'o //
analyzed: lcags kyi dri ma ni lcags kyi bshad pa'o //

analyzed: dri la sogs pa ni gu gul dang / sa dza ra sa'o //

analyzed: khrag sil ba ni las kyi kha dog go /

analyzed: gser gyi shing ni gser gyi ljon shing ngo //

analyzed: d'i dha pra ro ha ni pa la'o //

analyzed: sindhu bar ni nir kunda'o //
translated: Sindhuvara is nirguna.

original: shra m'a ni pri yam ku'o //
analyzed: shra m'a ni pri yam ku'o //
translated: śramaṇapriyaka,

original: ke sha ri ni n'a ga ge sar ro //
analyzed: ke sha ri ni n'a ga ge sar ro //
translated: keśarī,

original: rig pa 'dzin pa ni cam pa ka'o //
analyzed: rig pa 'dzin pa ni cam pa ka'o //

analyzed: n'a ga ni bu na na ga'o //
translated: nāga,

analyzed: 'khor lo 'thag pa ni aa di tsa'o //

analyzed: mtshan mo spyod pa ni yung ba'o //
translated: niśācara,🔽śikhi,

original: shi khi ni rma bya'i gtsug phud do /
analyzed: shi khi ni rma bya'i gtsug phud do /
translated: pravaranīvālaka,🔽bhūtaśatru,🔽varṣahara,

original: @500b pra ba ra ni b'a l'a ka'o //
analyzed: @500b pra ba ra ni b'a l'a ka'o //

analyzed: 'byung po'i dgra bo ni ni ra ku ta'o // ba ra hri da ni ba lla bhi da rkun ma'i me tog tu brjod do //
translated: roganāyaka,🔽bhavapāṣāṇa,🔽caura,

original: ka r'a kar ni ka ra na dza'o //
analyzed: ka r'a kar ni ka ra na dza'o //
translated: kaṃsū,

original: man dza ri ni 'dul bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: man dza ri ni 'dul bar byed pa'o //
translated: Translation: śramaṇapriyaka,🔽keśarī,🔽vidyādhara,🔽nāga,

original: gser gyi shing gi shun pa ni pags pa'o //
analyzed: gser gyi shing gi shun pa ni pags pa'o //
translated: cakrakalāpa,🔽niśācara,

original: gha na ni mu sta ka'o //
analyzed: gha na ni mu sta ka'o //
translated: śikhi,🔽pravaranīvālaka,

original: mtshan mo'i shing ni skyer ba'i shing ngo //
analyzed: mtshan mo'i shing ni skyer ba'i shing ngo //
translated: bhūtaśatru,

original: nad kyi dbang po ni kunda'o //
analyzed: nad kyi dbang po ni kunda'o //
translated: varṣahara,🔽karavīraka,🔽manjūṣaka,🔽suvarṇavṛkṣacarma,

original: srid pa'i rdul ni khyim gyi me tog go //
analyzed: srid pa'i rdul ni khyim gyi me tog go //
translated: ghana,🔽niśavṛkṣa,

original: rkun ma ni rgan po gzhon par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rkun ma ni rgan po gzhon par byed pa'o //
translated: roganāyaka,🔽bhavapāṣāṇa,🔽caura,

original: kem su ni de'i yongs su smin pa'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: kem su ni de'i yongs su smin pa'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: kaṃsū,

original: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i sgrub pa dang rab tu ldan pa la /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i sgrub pa dang rab tu ldan pa la /
translated: In order to destroy the māras of the gods, etc.,

original: lha'i bu'i bdud la sogs pa kha cig 'byung ba tshar bcad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lha'i bu'i bdud la sogs pa kha cig 'byung ba tshar bcad pa'i phyir /
translated: that arise in the context of the practice of the maṇḍala, etc.,

original: mtshon cha kun gyi phyag rgya che //
analyzed: mtshon cha kun gyi phyag rgya che //
translated: the great mudrā of all weapons🔽is the five types of hand-to-hand combat:🔽the thrown, the not thrown,

original: 'khrul 'khor 'phangs dang ma 'phangs dang // de bzhin lag pas 'phangs pa nyid //
analyzed: 'khrul 'khor 'phangs dang ma 'phangs dang // de bzhin lag pas 'phangs pa nyid //
translated: and likewise, the thrown with the hand,🔽the thrown with the hand and held,

original: 'phangs pa 'dzin par bcas pa dang // lag pa'i 'thab mo lnga pa nyid //
analyzed: 'phangs pa 'dzin par bcas pa dang // lag pa'i 'thab mo lnga pa nyid //
translated: and the hand-to-hand combat with the five.

original: gzhu yi rig byed rang gyur pas //
analyzed: gzhu yi rig byed rang gyur pas //
translated: The one who has become the science of the bow

original: phyag rgya rab tu gnas par bya //
analyzed: phyag rgya rab tu gnas par bya //
translated: should perform the consecration of the mudrā.

original: de la sbyor 'phangs mda' la sogs //
analyzed: de la sbyor 'phangs mda' la sogs //
translated: Therein, the thrown is the arrow, etc.,

original: ma 'phangs pa ni ral gri sogs /🔽lag pas grol ba 'khor lo sogs //
analyzed: ma 'phangs pa ni ral gri sogs / lag pas grol ba 'khor lo sogs //
translated: the not thrown is the sword, etc.,🔽the hand-to-hand combat is the discus, etc.,

original: grol ba 'dzin bcas zhags pa sogs //
analyzed: grol ba 'dzin bcas zhags pa sogs //
translated: the held is the noose, etc.,

original: mtshon cha thams cad yongs spangs nas //
analyzed: mtshon cha thams cad yongs spangs nas //
translated: and the abandonment of all weapons

original: lag pa'i 'thab mos dgra 'dral sogs //
analyzed: lag pa'i 'thab mos dgra 'dral sogs //
translated: is the hand-to-hand combat with the enemy, etc.

original: de bzhin bcing ba yang dag ldan //
analyzed: de bzhin bcing ba yang dag ldan //
translated: Likewise, the binding is the correct possession

original: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
translated: of the glorious Vajrasattva.

original: mtshon cha'i mchog ni sna tshogs pa'i //
analyzed: mtshon cha'i mchog ni sna tshogs pa'i //
translated: The supreme weapon is the various

original: gnas dag dbyibs ni rab bshad bya //
analyzed: gnas dag dbyibs ni rab bshad bya //
translated: The pure places and shapes are well explained.

original: rnal 'byor sgrub thabs shin tu @501a *//
analyzed: rnal 'byor sgrub thabs shin tu @501a *//
translated: The yoga method is very🔽beautiful.

original: mdzes // sbyor dang myur bar gsor ba dang // dgug pa dang ni 'dzin pa nyid //
analyzed: mdzes // sbyor dang myur bar gsor ba dang // dgug pa dang ni 'dzin pa nyid //
translated: The union, the quick thrust, the drawing in, and the holding,

original: gsal ba ru ni gtong ba ste //
analyzed: gsal ba ru ni gtong ba ste //
translated: The emission in the clear light,

original: sa la mnyam stabs phyag rgyas gdab //
analyzed: sa la mnyam stabs phyag rgyas gdab //
translated: The earth-even stance, the seal impression,

original: bee sha kha gsar phyag rgyas gdab //
analyzed: bee sha kha gsar phyag rgyas gdab //
translated: The seal impression of the new viśva,

original: dkyil 'khor de nyid phyag rgyas gdab //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor de nyid phyag rgyas gdab //
translated: The seal impression of that very maṇḍala,

original: gnas ni gsum du g-yas pas brkyang //
analyzed: gnas ni gsum du g-yas pas brkyang //
translated: The right leg extended in the three places,

original: dbyibs kyi phyag rgya bka' stsal pa //🔽mthe bong dang ni sor mo rnams //
analyzed: dbyibs kyi phyag rgya bka' stsal pa // mthe bong dang ni sor mo rnams //
translated: The shape seal is taught.🔽The thumb and the fingers

original: long bu'i nang du sbyar ba yin //
analyzed: long bu'i nang du sbyar ba yin //
translated: Are joined in the hollow of the ankle.

original: gang zhig brtan par sbyar ba ni //
analyzed: gang zhig brtan par sbyar ba ni //
translated: Whatever is firmly joined

original: mnyam pa'i rkang stabs gnas su gsungs //🔽rkang pa'i sor mo phyir bzhag nas //
analyzed: mnyam pa'i rkang stabs gnas su gsungs // rkang pa'i sor mo phyir bzhag nas //
translated: Is said to be the even-footed stance.🔽Placing the toes outward,

original: pus mo gnyis ni bsrang ste g-yo //
analyzed: pus mo gnyis ni bsrang ste g-yo //
translated: The two knees are straightened and shaken.

original: sor ni nyi shu rtsa drug tshad //
analyzed: sor ni nyi shu rtsa drug tshad //
translated: The measure of twenty-six finger lengths

original: gnas ni bee sha kha ru brjod //
analyzed: gnas ni bee sha kha ru brjod //
translated: Is said to be the viśva place.

original: ngang pa'i gshog pa'i dbyibs su ni //
analyzed: ngang pa'i gshog pa'i dbyibs su ni //
translated: The shape of a goose’s wings,

original: pus mo gnyis ni mnyam sbyar ba //
analyzed: pus mo gnyis ni mnyam sbyar ba //
translated: The two knees are joined together.

original: bar du yang ni khru gnyis nyid //
analyzed: bar du yang ni khru gnyis nyid //
translated: In the middle, it is two cubits.

original: de ni dkyil 'khor rkang thabs gsungs //
analyzed: de ni dkyil 'khor rkang thabs gsungs //
translated: This is said to be the posture of the maṇḍala.

original: gang yang gshol gyi dbyibs mnyam par //
analyzed: gang yang gshol gyi dbyibs mnyam par //
translated: Further, the plow is equal.

original: pus mo brla yi g-yas bsrungs na //
analyzed: pus mo brla yi g-yas bsrungs na //
translated: The right knee is protected by the thigh.

original: g-yon ni byol song 'gro ba yin //
analyzed: g-yon ni byol song 'gro ba yin //
translated: The left is the animal realm.

original: 'khyud nas brla dang brang du gnas //
analyzed: 'khyud nas brla dang brang du gnas //
translated: Encircling, it rests on the thigh and chest.

original: mtho lnga rnam par rgyas par ni //
analyzed: mtho lnga rnam par rgyas par ni //
translated: Five fingerbreadths extended

original: g-yas brkyang bar ni de rab grags //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang bar ni de rab grags //
translated: is well known as the right-side extension.

original: de nyid rnam par bzlog pa ni //
analyzed: de nyid rnam par bzlog pa ni //
translated: That very [posture] reversed

original: de ni g-yon brkyang ba ru brjod //🔽lhod min pa dang mkhrang ba nyid //
analyzed: de ni g-yon brkyang ba ru brjod // lhod min pa dang mkhrang ba nyid //
translated: is said to be the left-side extension.🔽Not loose and not stiff,

original: mnyen zhing yan lag brtan pa nyid //
analyzed: mnyen zhing yan lag brtan pa nyid //
translated: flexible and with firm limbs,

original: gang las skye mched rnam par dag /
analyzed: gang las skye mched rnam par dag /
translated: from which the sense bases are purified,

original: rang gi sku yi phyag rgya ches //🔽rims kyi nad @501b dang dug gi nad //
analyzed: rang gi sku yi phyag rgya ches // rims kyi nad @501b dang dug gi nad //
translated: with one’s own mahāmudrā of the body,🔽the illness of contagious fever, the illness of poison,

original: mkha' 'gro'i 'tshe ba gdon dag ni //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro'i 'tshe ba gdon dag ni //
translated: the harm of ḍākinīs, and spirits,

original: 'dis ni yan lag kun brgyan pa //
analyzed: 'dis ni yan lag kun brgyan pa //
translated: this adorns all the limbs

original: thams cad du ni zil gyis gnon //
analyzed: thams cad du ni zil gyis gnon //
translated: and conquers everything.

original: gang ba'i skye mched kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: gang ba'i skye mched kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the mudra of the sense base of the filled [abode].

original: rang snying 'gugs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
analyzed: rang snying 'gugs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
translated: The yogin of attracting the heart

original: shin tu mdzes pas gzhu nyid gzung //
analyzed: shin tu mdzes pas gzhu nyid gzung //
translated: should hold the bow with a beautiful string.🔽Turning to the right,

original: g-yas su rab tu bsgyur ba dang // mda' ni bcug na 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: g-yas su rab tu bsgyur ba dang // mda' ni bcug na 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: and inserting the arrow, he will succeed.

original: mngon du lag pa mnyam byas nas //
analyzed: mngon du lag pa mnyam byas nas //
translated: Having made the hands equal,

original: rgyab tu bkug nas rim par ni //
analyzed: rgyab tu bkug nas rim par ni //
translated: and bent them back in stages,

original: gang zhig dal gyis dgug bya zhing //
analyzed: gang zhig dal gyis dgug bya zhing //
translated: one should slowly attract

original: 'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya //
translated: and attract all beings.

original: thams cad dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o //🔽rna ba'i skye mched dkyil 'khor du //
analyzed: thams cad dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o // rna ba'i skye mched dkyil 'khor du //
translated: This is the seal of attraction.🔽Having inserted the ear sense-­field

original: bcug nas rim pa ji lta bar //🔽aom ni ji srid rang 'dzin pa //
analyzed: bcug nas rim pa ji lta bar // aom ni ji srid rang 'dzin pa //
translated: into the maṇḍala,🔽one should hold the oṃ

original: ji srid dus su aom zlos 'gyur //
analyzed: ji srid dus su aom zlos 'gyur //
translated: as long as one recites the oṃ.

original: de srid dus su gzung bar bya //
analyzed: de srid dus su gzung bar bya //
translated: One should hold it for that long.

original: 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the seal of holding.🔽Having bent them back in stages,

original: rim pa ji ltar mnyam bkug nas; ;cho ga ji bzhin gzung bar bya //
analyzed: rim pa ji ltar mnyam bkug nas; ;cho ga ji bzhin gzung bar bya //
translated: one should hold them as prescribed.

original: de la cung zad drang bya zhing //
analyzed: de la cung zad drang bya zhing //
translated: One should draw them out a little

original: yongs su bkang na 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: yongs su bkang na 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: and fill them completely, and one will succeed.

original: dgang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: dgang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the seal of filling.

original: 'dzum zhing mig gis blta ba dang // 'ben la khu tshur gdab par bya //🔽sta stangs khu tshur bcug nas ni //
analyzed: 'dzum zhing mig gis blta ba dang // 'ben la khu tshur gdab par bya // sta stangs khu tshur bcug nas ni //
translated: and striking the target with the fist.

original: rab tu btung nas mchog 'grub 'gyur //
analyzed: rab tu btung nas mchog 'grub 'gyur //
translated: Having drunk well, one will attain the supreme.

original: gzhu yis rnam par rgyal pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: gzhu yis rnam par rgyal pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the mudrā of victory with the bow.🔽The square, the sharp, the round,

original: gru bzhi rnon po zlum po dang // de bzhin mchog tu bskor ba nyid //
analyzed: gru bzhi rnon po zlum po dang // de bzhin mchog tu bskor ba nyid //
translated: and likewise the supreme turning.

original: gang du g-yas nas bskod bya zhing //
analyzed: gang du g-yas nas bskod bya zhing //
translated: Where one should turn to the right,

original: de bzhin 'og dang steng du 'gro /
analyzed: de bzhin 'og dang steng du 'gro /
translated: and likewise go below and above.

original: rim pas mnan cing drag mnan pas //
analyzed: rim pas mnan cing drag mnan pas //
